title: Republicans Claimed Biden Censored YouTube. 20 Employees Seem to Say Otherwise
summary: Lawyers for Alphabet, Youtube's parent company, recently alleged that the Biden administration tried to “influence” the company. Interviews with employees don't appear to support their claim.

title: Controversial startup's plan to 'sell sunlight' using giant mirrors in space would be 'catastrophic' and 'horrifying,' astronomers warn
summary: California-based startup Reflect Orbital aims to build a swarm of 4,000 giant mirrors in low Earth orbit to "sell sunlight" to customers at night. Experts warn that the mirrors could mess with telescopes, blind stargazers and impact the environment.

title: China solves 'century-old problem' with new analog chip that is 1,000 times faster than high-end Nvidia GPUs
summary: Researchers from Peking University say their resistive random-access memory chip may be capable of speeds 1,000 faster than the Nvidia H100 and AMD Vega 20 GPUs.

summary: Researchers have gained new insights into rhinoceros evolution and the longevity of the North Atlantic Land Bridge from analyzing the perfectly preserved fossils of a "frosty" Arctic rhino.

title: Astronomers discover surprisingly lopsided disk around a nearby star using groundbreaking telescope upgrade

title: 'Chemo brain' may stem from damage to the brain's drainage system
